Sentencas: Fuel cells are hopeful for future energy systems, because they are energy efficient and able to use renewable fuels.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach

Sentencas: A coupled computational fluid dynamics approach based on the finite element method, in three-dimensions, is used to illustrate a planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach

Sentencas: Governing equations for momentum, gas-phase species, heat, electron and ion transport are implemented and coupled to kinetics describing electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach

Sentencas: Three different cell designs are compared in a parametric study.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach

Sentencas: The importance of the cathode support layer is revealed, because this layer significantly decreases the oxygen gas-phase resistance within the cathode (at positions under the interconnect ribs) in the direction normal to the cathode/electrolyte interface as well as the electron resistance inside the cathode (at positions under the air channel) in the same direction.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach

Sentencas: It is concluded that wider and thinner gas channels enable a more compact design with only a slightly decreased cell current density (per cross-sectional electrode/electrolyte interface area), i.e. a considerably increased volumetric cell current can be achieved.
Titulo: SOFC Cell Design Optimization Using the Finite Element Method Based CFD Approach
